title: How To Waste $200 on Amazon...
description: Ken is at it again with some mystery Amazon tech... This is definitely not an iPod - Cayin N3 on Amazon:  This is definitely not Google Glass - TheiaPro on Amazon:  This is definitely not a phone for Ken - Jitterbug Smart on Amazon:  This is definitely Ken approved - Magic Sing Karaoke on Amazon:   Subscribe!  Instagram:  Twitter:  Facebook:
